Gonna skip unnecessary steps, I think

## Day 1

- Get keys from realtor's office
- Get flask from pub
- Get lantern from pub
- Get Michael at library
- Go home
- Sleep

## Day 2

- Take journal from dining room
	- Safe combination: 55-6-14
- Take puzzle box and flute from safe
- Get iron key from cellar
- Gave whiskey to bum and hear his story
- Show skull to bum
- Get newspaper from town square
- Go to Cauldron
	- Got amulet
	- Open puzzle box and got disk
- Give amulet to bum
	- Get small copper key
- Get fish tin
- Unlock Michael's computer and read his journal

## Day 3

- Spy on Michael
- Put disk in telescope and get name "Ialdabaoloth"
- Spin wine bottles
	- C -> W -> H -> E -> M
- Find correct flute holes and play flute
- Go to the slaughterhouse and get the teddy bear
- Go in the church and get the key from the realtor

[save file after church](https://pr-if.org/play/anchorhead/#)

- rub fish oil on the rusty hinges and open the sewer hatch
- Found note from Claudia Benson in realtor's office
- To the lighthouse!
	- Couldn't do anything. To the mill!
- The newspaper tells which house Jeffrey lived in. Take his bear there
- Take key from overalls
- Search thicket at bare foundation to find hatch
- omg I need the towel now???
- Put towel on the wheel, spin it. Open the hatch, wait, open again
- The narrow corridors on the factory floor feel like a maze, but I'm not really motivated to find the route
- Pushing button with umbrella ought to have worked, but oh well.
- The chain is too greasy to hold -> Ok, lets tie it to my waist
	- This felt like a stretch, honestly.
- Memo to use gloves with mirrors and keep them clean
- Main focusing mirror is 0.0145
	- mirror 1
- Nothing more to do, let's leave
- Michael is at the lighthouse
- Attacked!

## The last night

[save file](https://pr-if.org/play/anchorhead/#)

- Kick the door down, pick up the glass
- I would have never figured to look at the window in the hallway or especially to put my glass shard in the cracks
- Anyways, put the glass in the crack, cut my jacket with the glass
- ...and the madman ate me because I took too long.

DIED 50/100

- Restore from the start of this chapter
- Get my stuff before the madman leaves his cell
- Give porno to the madman
	- Oh that didn't do anything, he ate me anyways

- Back to exiting my cell
- Since I have hands, I can open these cell doors.
- Go inside the cell with the bloodstains
	- Oh, Edward's cell! Found his note
- So it seems that last time, I tried to exit the gate without unlocking it first, which alerted the madman and made him eat me. Unlocking it while he is reading his porno give me enough time to go through the gate, letting him eat the orderly.
- Go to the square, then hide in the side alley
- Got the amulet back
- William on the bridge

Well, I think that I am stuck.
I didn't get Anna's gold locket from William's room in the attic. Now that I have no flashlight and no matches, the house is too dark for me to get to the attic.
Walkthrough says the key is in the flooded passage, but maybe that is an old version of the game. Maybe the key from the realtor's office? I am not sure.
